message:
A campaign attempted to be sent but was not approved on the schools it was directed towards.

**Priority Level: P3**

Please notify the appropriate CSM for the employer w/ relevant details (usually handled by product):

Bugsnag link for Campaign details: https://app.bugsnag.com/handshake/handshake/errors/6051056ff56d0d00071bdb28
(if the above link does not work search Bugsnag for "EmployerTeam::CampaignBatchWorker@mailers" and/or the relevant Campaign ID) @slack-incidents-emp-mkt-product
name: Mismatched Approved Schools on Campaign
